effects.name: Branch
effects.description: Execute the following code X times. Useful for testing probabilities without requiring a loop and indentation.

effects.name: Clear Server Recipes
effects.description: Clears all recipes registered in the server. Use

effects.name: Clear Single Recipes
effects.description: Clears all recipes for a single item.

effects.name: Client Block
effects.description: Make a player see a block as another type of block. If the client recieves an update to the block, it will revert.

effects.name: Client Sign
effects.description: Cause a sign to have custom lines to certain viewers.

effects.name: Developer Mode Option
effects.description: Enable the developer mode pragma to auto reload a script as it changes. This must be placed under the script-local options.

effects.name: Do effect
effects.description: Executes a Lambda x times.

effects.name: Draw Image on Map
effects.description: Accepts an image and draws it on a map written after running Manage Map on it. Omitting the position to draw the image draws it starting from the top left corner.

effects.name: Draw Text on Map
effects.description: Draws text on a map that has been run through Manage Map. Omitting the position draws the text at 0, 0.

effects.patterns:
make %entity% home towards %location%
make %entity% home towards %location% normally
effects.name: Entity Homing
effects.description: Cause an entity to home towards a locations. Specifying 'normally' reduces bugs caused by varying distances, but makes it less accurate.

effects.name: Erase Map
effects.description: Completely removes all tasks run on a map. Overwrites Draw Image, Draw Text, and Draw Cursor.

effects.name: Escape Lines
effects.description: Skip the execution of a certain number of lines.

effects.name: Evaluate Input Effect
effects.description: Runs the input string relative to the calling trigger which invoked it.

effects.patterns:
format slot %number% of %players% with %item stack% to close then run %text%
format slot %number% of %players% with %item stack% to run %text%
format slot %number% of %players% with %item stack% to close
format slot %number% of %players% with %item stack% to (be|act) unstealable
unformat slot %number% of %players%
effects.name: Format Inventory Slot
effects.description:
Formats a slot in the player's open inventory to do certain actions. This should be done directly after showing an inventory to the player.
Lambda expression can also be used instead of a command.

effects.name: Invoke Cross Access
effects.description: Permits a function to retrieve and inject data from the current event. The current code block will not continue until the function calls Return or Soft Return.

effects.name: Invoke Subroutine
effects.description: Call a Subroutine

effects.patterns:
%objects% for each %lambda%
%objects% where %predicate% for each %lambda% respectively
effects.name: Lamba For Each
Launch Fireworks
effects.description: Launch a firework with any number of firework effects at a given location and flight duration. Use Firework Effect expression to create firework effects.

effects.name: Leash Entities
effects.description: Cause multiple entities to leash other entities.

effects.name: Level Access
effects.description: Usable in functions. Modifies the next line to be run in the scope of code which called the function. Data declared within the function may not be accessed. Use Transient Object to carry data between these scopes.

effects.name: Make Damage
effects.description: Cause entities to damage each other. If you cause hostile mobs to attack or be attacked, they will become aggroed on the last entity that they hit or got hit by.

effects.name: Make Say
effects.description: Force players to say text in chat. If you add a leading slash in the text, it will execute a command.

effects.name: Manage Map
effects.description: Allows maps to be controlled by skQuery. Using 'manage' will share the renderer with other custom map renderers. 'Override' deletes existing renderers.

effects.name: Pathfind
effects.description: Invoke the entity pathfinder. Allows entities to pathfind to a location unless they are distracted. Not all entities have pathfinders.

effects.name: Play MIDI
effects.description: Plays a file with the extention .mid to a player.

effects.name: Play MIDI from Website
effects.description: Play a MIDI file from a website to a player.

effects.name: Play Particle
effects.description: Play particle effects at a certain location. You can create particles with Particle.

effects.patterns: play raw sound %text% at %locations% with pitch %number% volume %number%
effects.name: Play Raw Sound
effects.description: Imitates the functionality of the /playsound command, without the ability to specify target players.

effects.name: Pop Firework
effects.description: Instantly detonate a firework at a given location. Having multiple effects will cause them to stack.

effects.name: Preinit Driver Option
effects.description: Allows you to initialize an SQL driver before accessing it. Not required for an SQL connection.

effects.patterns:
register new shaped recipe for %item type% using %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%
register new shapeless recipe for %item type% using %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%, %item type%
effects.name: Register Recipe
effects.description: Register a crafting recipe. Use air as an itemtype to indicate the slot is not used. All 9 itemtypes must be present.

effects.name: Restore Inventory
effects.description: Restores a player's inventory to a backup. This effect is deprecated and you should use

effects.name: Return
effects.description: return

effects.name: Safely Execute Thread
effects.description: Makes the next line of code run on a different thread. The code following it will be delayed until the thread finishes.

effects.name: Send Json
effects.description:
Sends a Json Message. 

For examples, refer to the [tutorial](http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages).

effects.name: Set Block Without Updates
effects.description: Set blocks to another block without causing surrounding blocks to update.

effects.name: Set Display
effects.description:
This effect must be used after creating a scoreboard. It states where to show the scoreboard.

Note: You might need to write display slot names in upper case.

effects.name: Set Score
effects.description: It sets a new score in a scoreboard or changes a pre-defined one.

effects.patterns: make %livingentity% shoot [an] item projectile [of] %itemtype%[ at speed %number%]
effects.name: Shoot Item Projectile
Show Credits
effects.description: Shows the end credits to the player. If the player is using a resource pack, it will display the end credits of their resource pack to them.

effects.name: skQueryPerms Option
effects.description: Enables skQuery as a permissions manager. You will then be able to access expressions that represent player permissions and change them with Skript.

effects.name: Soft Return
effects.description: Soft returns execute the rest of the code where the original access request was executed, while still running the rest of the function code.

effects.patterns:
spawn falling block of %item type% at %location%
spawn damaging falling block of %item type% at %location%
spawn undroppable falling block of %item type% at %location%
spawn damaging undroppable falling block of %item type% at %location%
spawn undroppable damaging falling block of %item type% at %location%
effects.name: Spawn Falling Block
effects.description: Summons falling blocks with modifiable properties.

effects.name: SQL Password Option
effects.description: Sets the script-wide database connection password. Required for an SQL connection.

effects.name: SQL URL Option
effects.description: Sets the script-wide database connection url. Required for an SQL connection.

effects.name: SQL Username Option
effects.description: Sets the script-wide database connection username. Required for an SQL connection.

effects.name: Stop MIDI
effects.description: Stops a file with the extention .mid

effects.name: Trail
effects.description: Trails a projectile with a particle effect. This effect can be used to make some cool visual effects.

effects.name: Visibility
effects.description: Show or hide players from each other

types.name: Display Slot
types.description: The display position for a scoreboard objective.

types.name: Firework Type
types.description:
A shape usable when creating firework effects.

Usable types: ball, ball large, burst, creeper, star

types.name: Lambda
types.description: Inline more code with lambda expressions! Lambdas are 2 cool new types that allow you to embed code inside your code. There are two types of lambdas, lambdas, which contain effects, and predicates, which contain conditions. You can combine multiple lambdas or predicates, but not both of them together.

types.name: Markup
types.description: Another form of text. Markup is not as intuitive as text and does not require you to add percent signs around expressions. This type is only used for more complex features of skQuery.

types.name: Particletypes
types.description: Represents an enum of static particle types. This type is added purely for anyone who needs to call Enum Values

types.name: Sound
types.description: Represents a sound from Bukkit's sound enum

conditions.name: Comparison Query
conditions.description: A different and more compact way of making comparisons using skQuery.

conditions.patterns:
%boolean% ? %object% to return if true :%object% to return if false
%object% ? %object% to return if the first object is not set
conditions.name: Conditional
File Existance
conditions.description: Checks wether a file exists or not. Returns a boolean.

conditions.patterns:
%living entities% has %potion%
%living entities% does(n't| not) have %potion%
conditions.name: Has Potion
conditions.description: Checks whether or not an entity has a certain potion effect on it.

conditions.patterns:
%item type% is [a] block
%item type% is not [a] block
conditions.name: Is Block
conditions.description: Checks whether or not a certain itemtype is a placeable block.

conditions.patterns:
%number% is divisible by %number%
%number% is not divisible by %number%
conditions.name: Is Divisible
conditions.description: Checks whether or not a number can be divided into another number.

conditions.name: Is Prime
conditions.description: Checks whether or not a number is prime.

conditions.patterns:
%location% is within %location% to %location%
%location% is not within %location% to %location%
conditions.name: Is Within Cuboid
conditions.description: Checks whether or not a certain location is included in a 3d cube with 2 endpoints.

expressions.name: Arabic Numeral
expressions.description:
Converts a roman number to arabic number.
See also: Roman Numeral

expressions.patterns:
inventory of %inventorytype%
chest with %number% row[s]
chest with %number% row[s] named %string%
expressions.name: Blank Inventories

expressions.patterns:
inventory of %inventory type%
chest with %number% row[s]
chest with %number% row[s] named %text%
expressions.name: Blank Inventory
Blast Radius
expressions.description: The size of an explosion.

expressions.name: Block Chunk
expressions.description: Represents every single block within a chunk.

expressions.name: Block Cube
expressions.description: Represents the blocks within a cuboid area.

expressions.name: Check
expressions.description: Checks a predicate Lambda.

expressions.patterns:
sin[e] %number%
cos[ine] %number%
tan[gent] %number%
arc sin[e] %number%
arc cos[ine] %number%
arc tan[gent] %number%
hyperbolic sin[e] %number%
hyperbolic cos[ine] %number%
hyperbolic tan[gent] %number%
[natural ]log[arithm] %number%
base(-| )10 log[arithm] %number%
signum %number%
(sqrt|square root)[ of] %number%
(%number% factorial|%number%!)
expressions.name: Complicated Math
expressions.description: Complex math operations.

expressions.name: Entities in Chunk
expressions.description: All the entities inside a chunk.

expressions.name: Enum Values
expressions.description: Returns a list of all the possible values for a type

expressions.name: Exploded Blocks
expressions.description: The blocks that will be destroyed in an explosion event.

expressions.name: Fake Max Players
expressions.description: Provides a false maximum player number that is seen when players refresh their server listings.  Some server listing websites are also fooled by this.

expressions.patterns: (1¦|2¦flickering |3¦trailing |4¦flickering trailing |5¦trailing flickering )%firework type% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %colors% (1¦|2¦flickering |3¦trailing |4¦flickering trailing |5¦trailing flickering )%firework type% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %colors% fad(e|ing) [to] %colors%
expressions.name: Firework Effect

expressions.patterns:
(1?|2?flickering |3?trailing |4?flickering trailing |5?trailing flickering )%fireworktype% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %rgbcolors%
(1?|2?flickering |3?trailing |4?flickering trailing |5?trailing flickering )%fireworktype% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %rgbcolors% fad(e|ing) [to] %rgbcolors%
(1?|2?flickering |3?trailing |4?flickering trailing |5?trailing flickering )%fireworktype% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %rgbcolors%
(1?|2?flickering |3?trailing |4?flickering trailing |5?trailing flickering )%fireworktype% [firework] [effect] colo[u]red %rgbcolors% fad(e|ing) [to] %rgbcolors%
expressions.name: Fireworkect
Flight Mode
expressions.description: Sets the player's fly state. True lets them fly, false lets them fall to the earth!

expressions.name: Former Location
expressions.description: Used in On Any Movement event

expressions.name: Glowing Item
expressions.description: Ability to make an itemstack glow without enchantments.

expressions.name: Health Scale
expressions.description: The health scale a player is shown. Health scale determines how many hearts a player can see and can be used to increase max hp without altering heart count.

expressions.name: Health Scale Mode
expressions.description: A true/false expression representing whether or not a player is shown a scaled health.

expressions.name: Holo Particle
expressions.description: Don't use this yet, still a work in progress

expressions.name: Hotbar Slot
expressions.description: The current slot number that the player is on, ranges from 1 to 9.

expressions.name: Incendiary Explosion
expressions.description: A true/false expression that defines if a fireball will light fire on the terrain upon explosion. Works only for small fireballs (blaze fireballs) and large fireballs (ghast fireballs).

expressions.name: Inventory Name
expressions.description: Returns the name of an inventory. Useful for ensuring an inventory is still open while you edit the contents

expressions.name: Inventory Serials
expressions.description: Saves a variable containing all the contents of an inventory. Does NOT include armor.

expressions.patterns:
%inventories%'s global max stack size
[the] global max stack size of %inventories%
expressions.name: Item Stack Size
Json Link
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Json Message
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Json Message Append
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Json Message Command
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Json Message Style
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Json Message Tooltip
expressions.description:
For examples, refer to the tutorial 

http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/skript/forum/tutorials/68371-json-messages/

expressions.name: Lored Item Stack
expressions.description: Adds a lore portion of an item

expressions.name: Modulus
expressions.description: Returns the remainder of the division operation. For example, if you mod 3 by 2, the remainder will be 1.

expressions.name: Moon Phase
expressions.description: The current phase of the moon in a world.

expressions.name: MOTD
expressions.description: Message of the day, in other words, your server name shown in server list. This expression can only be used in &quot;on server ping&quot; event.

expressions.name: New Line
expressions.description: Adds a new line in a book or  message.

expressions.name: Null
expressions.description: The absence of any value, can is used as a substitute for the reset, delete, clear, or remove effect; or it can be used as a substitute for the iis not set condition.

expressions.name: Plugin Version
expressions.description: Returns the version of an installed plugin.

expressions.patterns:
%entities%'s (primer|fuse lighting piece of shit)
[the] (primer|fuse lighting piece of shit) of %entities%
expressions.name: Primer
Regen Reason
expressions.description: The cause of a healing event.

expressions.name: Regex Match
expressions.description: Searches strings based on a pattern. t isolates part of a string based on the pattern specified. It requires that you use the text-processing language for the pattern.

expressions.name: Roman Numeral
expressions.description:
Converts an arabic number to roman number.
See also: Arabic Numeral

expressions.name: Tame Owner
expressions.description: The owner of a tamed entity.

expressions.name: Transient Object
expressions.description: Objects shared between an instance of a function and the caller code that can only be used within functions. They can only be read one time after they are set, as it is only a temporary bridge between the function and the caller.

expressions.name: URL Text
expressions.description:
text form [url] %string%
Pulls text from url page source.

Common use:
php using sql pull/get

expressions.name: UUID To Player
expressions.description: Get a player from a UUID.

expressions.name: Villager Job
expressions.description: The current profession of a villager.

expressions.name: Where Filter
expressions.description: Filters multiple objects that must match the predicate.

events.name: On Any Movement
events.description: Called when a player performs any movement.

events.name: On Block Land
events.description: Called when a falling block lands.

events.name: On Book Edit
events.description:
Called on the edit of a book.

Useful for only letting donors write books (kidding)

events.name: On Sheep Dye
events.description: Called on the dye of a sheep.

events.name: On Tab Complete
events.description: Called when a tab complete option you have definied for a command is used.

events.name: On Vehicle Collide
events.description: Called when a vehicle collides with an entity.
